description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-30088):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB update from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5039212
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: KB5039211
   - Ensure you select the corresponding build numbers for your system.

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition vulnerability that could allow for elevation of privilege on affected versions of Windows.
- For more information and to download the updates, visit the following links:
   - [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
   - [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - [KB5039213](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213)
   - [KB5039225](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039225)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a supported version of Windows (specifically 10 or 11).
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of the updates.
